siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Share text between your browser windows in real time such as long urls or meeting links across your devices and stay in flow while working online. Simple open the website on both devices and paste your text to share.
blogPost.body: Share text between your browser windows in real time such as long urls or meeting links across your devices and stay in flow while working online. Simple open the website on both devices and paste your text to share.
blogPost.title: Share TXT - Share text between browsers in real time
blogPost.author: Rex Anthony

localize.description: 在您的浏览器窗口之间实时共享文本，如长的URL或会议链接跨您的设备，并在在线工作时保持流动。只需在两台设备上打开网站，粘贴文字即可分享。
localize.tagline: 浏览器之间实时共享文本

localize.description: 在您的瀏覽器窗口之間實時共享文本，如長的URL或會議鏈接跨您的設備，並在在線工作時保持流動。只需在兩臺設備上打開網站，粘貼文字即可分享。
localize.tagline: 瀏覽器之間實時共享文本

previous.excerpt: 1 Big App - functionality at your fingertips. You always get the latest version of all the apps. App collection updated regularly. You can request features!
previous.title: 1 Big App - Power user essentials: 18 in 1 apps. Growing app collection

localize.description: 1个大应用--功能尽在指尖。你总是得到所有应用程序的最新版本。应用程序集合定期更新。你可以要求的功能
localize.tagline: 力用户的必备条件。18 个 1 合 1 应用程序。不断增长的应用收藏

localize.description: 1個大應用--功能盡在指尖。你總是得到所有應用程序的最新版本。應用程序集合定期更新。你可以要求的功能
localize.tagline: 力用戶的必備條件。18 個 1 合 1 應用程序。不斷增長的應用收藏

next.excerpt: Feather is an online platform that empowers creators and instructors to easily manage and monetize their virtual events, on-demand classes, and other digital content.
next.title: Feather - Host Zoom events, sell masterclasses, and build your brand.

localize.description: Feather是一个在线平台，使创作者和讲师能够轻松地管理他们的虚拟活动、按需课程和其他数字内容，并使之货币化。
localize.tagline: 举办Zoom活动，销售大师班，建立您的品牌。

localize.description: Feather是一個在線平臺，使創作者和講師能夠輕鬆地管理他們的虛擬活動、按需課程和其他數字內容，並使之貨幣化。
localize.tagline: 舉辦Zoom活動，銷售大師班，建立您的品牌。
